name: Acces your files anywhere
description: The ability to use a smartphone, table, or computer to acces your account means your files follow you everywhere.

name: Real-time collaboration
description: Securely share files and folders with friends, family and colleagues for live collaboration. no email attachments required.

name: Security you can trust
description: 2-factor authentication and user-controller encryption are just a couple of the security features we allow to help secure your files.

name: Store any types of file
description: Whether you are sharing holdays photos or work documents, Fylo has you covered allowing for all file types to be securely stored and shared.
